root.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XI
root.description: Gameplay This game returns to the ruler only strategy of Romance of the Three Kingdoms IX, which is most similar to the early entries in the franchise. The player can choose from many historical warlords who vied for power in China and manage their empire. Trivia This was the first game since Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire to be released on the PC outside of Asia. The PC version boasts a much higher resolution and uncompressed graphics.

similar_games.game: Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Grey Wolf
